titles.title: Restoring Health Benefits for Justice-Involved Individuals Act of 2019
Restoring Health Benefits for Justice-Involved Individuals Act of 2019
A bill to remove limitations on inmate eligibility for Medicare, the Children's Health Insurance Program, and veteran's health benefits.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Restoring Health Benefits for Justice-Involved Individuals Act of 2019
This bill allows an otherwise eligible individual who is in custody pending disposition of charges (i.e., pretrial detainees) to receive Medicare, Children's Health Insurance Program (CHIP), or veterans' health benefits.
